feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Add missing tr file for Turkish by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2432
  • [mob] Add FFProbe Metadata by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2054
  • [mob] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2454
  • [mob][photos] Init magic cache service only if internal user by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2445
  • [mob] Show video metadata inside fileInfo by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2466
  • [mob] Use video probe data for getting location during upload by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2468
  • [mob] Enable Polish language by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2470
  • [mob] Minor UX improvement by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2473
  • [mob] Add panorama viewer by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2362
  • [mob] Panorama state fix by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2480
  • [mob] Add placeholder for favorites slideshow widget by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2481
  • [mob] Disable panorama for external users by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2482
  • [mob][photos] Upgrade pinput pakage from 2.0.2 -> 5.0.0 by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2483
  • [mob] bump version: 0.9.14+914 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2492

New Contributors

  • @NickDiMucci made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2440
  • @dnred made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2449

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.7...photos-v0.9.14

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2507
  • Autolock options implemented by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2420
  • [mob][photos] Add Swipe Restriction and Authentication for Media Files by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2502
  • [mob][photos] Animate visibility toggling of appbar and bottom bar when toggling swipe lock by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2520
  • [mob][photos] Fix appbar getting clipped on custom font and display size on pixel 7 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2526
  • [mob][photos] Show app content by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2522
  • [mob][photos] Reorder security section in settings for consistent UI by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2538
  • [mob][photos] Improve UX on "Create new account" screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2548
  • [mob][photos]App lock screen UI improvements by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2536
  • [mob][photos] Add preview to the album link by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2553
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2567
  • [mob][photos] Subscription screen redesign by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2576

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.14...photos-v0.9.16

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Use custom onnx plugin by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2419
  • [mob] Put embeddings in same object by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2521
  • [mob] Simplify APIs for compress -> encrypt & vice versa by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2524
  • [mob][photos] Handle/fix issues with media dimensions by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2580
  • [mob][photo] Fix incorrect SQLite syntax (missing whitespace) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2587
  • [mob][photos] Multi-Item Selection and Deletion Feature for Quick Links by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2589
  • allow setting extra parameter for dsn by @winston0410 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2607
  • [mob][photos] Fix bug in parsing rotation metadata from video using FFProbe by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2595
  • [mob][photos] Swipe lock for multiple files by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2631
  • [mob][panorama] update panorama checking mechanism by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2532
  • [mob][photos] Guest view final changes by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2645
  • Add an icon to open the active location on Maps by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2663
  • [mob][photos] Fix Autofill Issue with Proton Pass in App Lock by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2664
  • [mob] Integrate new APIs & switch CLIP model by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2684
  • [mob][photos] Fullscreen UX improvements by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2694
  • [mob] Add option under advance settings to enable multi part upload by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2697
  • [mob][photos] Fix Safe area issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2703
  • [mob][photos] Update android target SDK by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2675
  • [mob][photos] Use native video player by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2700
  • Update icon for Panorama view by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2710
  • Update README.md by @brog-io in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2705
  • [mob][photos] Add more logs on deleting local files by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2713
  • [mob][photos] Remove feature flag from panorama viewer feature by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2715
  • [mob] Switch to nanoID, gzip person feedback, & merge ml db by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2724
  • [mob] Bypass map permission dialog if already given by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2722
  • Update Google Photos Takeout Instructions by @JaspalSuri in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2648
  • [mob] use blur instead of blurhash in panorama by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2739
  • [mob][photos] Workaround for android 10 free up space issue by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2637
  • Updated Mastodon links by @brog-io in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2754
  • [mob] CLIP & Face indexing V2 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2777
  • [mob] Change log by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2779
  • [mob][photos] Change guest view icon by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2782
  • [mob] Defer clip cache referesh untill next query by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2786
  • [mob][photos] Update guest view icon by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2791
  • [mob][photos] Fixed App Lock typo by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2789
  • Add option to claim a custom referral code by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2794
  • Ml invalid formats by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2793
  • Heic decode by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2800
  • [mob] Disable global ml flag by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2799
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.24 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2801
  • [mob] Fix redundant model download & rename by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2803
  • [mob][photos] Fix person cover photo by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2804
  • Ml copy by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2817
  • Prompt family members to contact admin to change referral code by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2816
  • [mob] Release tensors to avoid OOM error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2822
  • [mob] Fix android build by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2832
  • [mob] Revert to custom onnxruntime fork by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2834
  • [mob][photos] Use bilinear interpolation for clip by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2838
  • Revert app bar changes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2841
  • Fix status bar issue by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2842

New Contributors

  • @winston0410 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2607
  • @shmshd made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2627
  • @guspan-tanadi made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2633
  • @vktr2b made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2642
  • @JaspalSuri made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2648
  • @stro made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2806

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.16...photos-v0.9.27

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Squash bugs in Machine Learning pipeline by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2847
  • [mob] Fix remove from cluster & provide option to delete files from cluster view by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2858
  • [mob][photos] Type error by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2880
  • [mob][photos] Request authentication to view passkeys by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2854
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2914
  • [mob] Minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2927
  • [mob][photos] Fix SafeArea UI issues on file viewer by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2935
  • [mob] Notification fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2945
  • [mob] Solve onnx build issue Android by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2948
  • [mob][photos] Log format of decoding error by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2951
  • [mob] Update version v0.9.30 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2960

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.27...photos-v0.9.30

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.35
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2975
  • ML file download logs by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2979
  • [mob][photos] Update flutter version to v3.24.1 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2978
  • [mob]Remove dst from crowdin template by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2981
  • [mob] Fix lint by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2988
  • [mob] Upgrade crowdin config by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2989
  • [mob] Skip untranslated strings by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2990
  • Tiny cleanup by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2986
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2984
  • [mob] Fix missing magic search by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2982
  • [mob] l10n changes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2998
  • Ml fixesv148 by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3028
  • [mob][photos] fix: creating a new album from hidden section is not hidden by default by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3030
  • [mob] add backup upload status screen by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3005
  • [mob][auth] Upgrade to flutter v3.24.1 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/2980
  • [mob][photos] Fix: audio not playing on iOS when in silent mode by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3037
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.31 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3048
  • [mob] Open BackUp Status bar on tap of SyncStatus by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3049
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3090
  • [mob] Minor UX changes for backup status by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3094
  • [mob][photos] Trigger send logs on scale gesture by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3096
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3095
  • [mob][photos] Add option to enable or disable looping of videos by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3059
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.33 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3099
  • Ml logging by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3112
  • [mob][photos] Fix video player issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3110
  • [mob][photos][auth] Fix lockscreen not automatically appearing on opening app on iPad by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3100
  • [mob] Gracefully handle dup mapping by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3116
  • [mob][photos] Log index status of user by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3118
  • Clip vector by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3117
  • [mob] Change log and minor fixes by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.30...photos-v0.9.35
